Title: DIY Grow Lights
Book Description: 'There's a lot of interest in LED-based grow lights for people starting plants indoors- over-wintering tropical plants- and growing medicinal herbs. Where do you start? This panel will cover basic photosynthesis and light- spectral requirements- some of the options for rolling your own grow lights using high-power LEDs.  We'll also talk about some of the issues with using LEDs.'
